title: Draven skin concept
body: more of an idea than a concept. an ultimate draven skin wielding darth maul-like light sabers. i just really want a legendary or ultimate skin for the main character of league. rito make it happen

replies.body: Primetime Draven is his legendary skin.
Then it shall be 2017 Ultimate Skin

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=u6YJXJn2,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-01-22T08:23:14.743+0000)
>
> Then it shall be 2018 Ultimate Skin

Fixed it for you
